name: Downtown Dungeons
description:
early access build. we really appreciate feedback!

keyboard controls:

arrow keys to move. bump into enemies to attack.
W + arrow keys to target your next move/attack diagonally.
Q + arrow keys to use a special attack (starts a bullet-dodging minigame).
D for dungeon menu, Z to accept, X to cancel. (only the Items section works currently)
Z to pick up items. (go to the dungeon menu to use them)
F for a full view of the dungeon.

gamepad controls:

D-pad to move. bump into enemies to attack.
right shoulder + D-pad to target your next move/attack diagonally.
left shoulder + D-pad to use a special attack.
Start for dungeon menu, A to accept, B to cancel.
A to pick up items.
Y for a full view of the dungeon.
